system.effect: When hit by a melee weapon, if 1's digit of the attacker's attack roll is a 1 (EG: 21, 31, 41, etc), then weapon is destroyed. Power Fielded, Warp Weapons, Natural Weapons, or other similar Power Field immune weapons are not destroyed. -5 max agility.

description.value: When hit by a melee weapon, if 1's digit of the attacker's attack roll is a 1 (EG: 21, 31, 41, etc), then weapon is destroyed. Power Fielded, Warp Weapons, Natural Weapons, or other similar Power Field immune weapons are not destroyed. -5 max agility.
